documentation.text:
@title TRC20NoReturn
 @notice Non-standard TRC20 that doesn't return a value from transferFrom

@title TRC20False
 @notice TRC20 that always returns false from transferFrom

@title TRC20Revert
 @notice TRC20 that always reverts on transferFrom
